Participation and Engagement at the Community Level

children.label: Participation and Engagement at the Community Level

children.value:
At the Community Level, participation is comprised of the everyday actions and decisions made by all community members as they participate in the community and contribute to the book.
Expectations and responsibilities for all members, including Code of Conduct, Contributing Guidelines and Acknowledgements, have been provided and maintained in
and invited to optionally share narrative details in the
Information from these base files is also published as the
in the afterwards of the book.
Please refer to the Foreword of the book to learn about different kinds of

At the Maintenance Level, different groups of people come together to work on and promote specific areas and initiatives in the project, as well as define or change processes to make Community Level participation easier.
Please read
for community structure, commitments and resources used by members at the Maintenance Level.

Representation at Constitution Level Steering Committee

children.label: Representation at Constitution Level Steering Committee

children.value: “Constitutional-level” participation in the Steering Committee by community leaders allows the development, approval and establishment of Working Group and project-related norms that affect the entire project, community and sustainability.

for community structure, commitments and resources used by members at the Maintenance Level, which also applies to the Constitution Level.
